name: aura-break

effect.scarlet-violet: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.
effect.the-teal-mask: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.
effect.the-indigo-disk: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.

short_effect: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.
